description: Moist and fluffy with sweet nectarine slices, vanilla bean and banana, these healthier wholemeal muffins won't last long at your place.
keywords: Muffins,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Nectarine & Vanilla Wholemeal Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 yellow nectarines, halved, destoned, 2 thinly sliced into wedges, 2 coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Line a 12-hole, 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases.
Combine flour, baking powder and sugar in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre. Add egg, yoghurt, oil, vanilla, banana, grated nectarine and 1/2 cup water, and stir to combine (do not overmix).

Divide mixture among paper cases and top with sliced nectarine and oats. Bake for 25 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centre of muffins comes out clean. Cool in pan for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve.
